normalised: Hey, training regimens are key, right? Remember Milkha Singh's insane dedication! Doctor Sharma at S A I Patiala has some great insights. Heard they're building a new five thousand square foot gym there. Need to shed those extra rupees gained during Diwali. Maybe five kilometer runs every other day?
